item.title: This screen turned up several options trading ideas, including how to play Alcoa ahead of earnings
item.description: Because options strategies may have leverage, convexity and path-dependence, picking a high-quality underlying stock can give an investor an edge.

item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Palantir, Zoom, Microsoft, Roku, Netflix & more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Citi says Palantir’s rally isn’t over, upgrades stock on accelerating enterprise and government demand
item.description: Citi's $235 price target implies upside of 32% ahead for shares of Palantir.

item.title: Citigroup says that General Motors’ electric vehicle reset could drive next leg of gains
item.description: The bank's $98 price target implies 18% upside over the next year for GM shares.

item.title: The stars are lining up for more gains in Roku, according to Bank of America
item.description: The bank reiterated its buy rating on the streaming operator and hiked its price target.
